text:
Vincent missed some of the classes when he updated the licenses from 1.1 to 2.0.
 The enclosed patch fixes the ones he missed (59 total).  I checked the
copyright years on the 1.1's before replacing--they were all 1999-2003.
creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com

text:

Patch to update license headers
